title: When you're a fed Karthus and the enemy Blitz pulls you into his team
body:
And the enemy quickly realizes what time it is...

http://img.ifcdn.com/images/baffe698372932cd7feabf0d4eca130d084ef9d1d7d4d070b3579927ad9352a9_1.jpg

replies.body:
Oh I get it because Papyrus says  "You are going to have a bad time!"

**JOKES PLEASE DON'T KILL ME**
https://41.media.tumblr.com/a9b54bf818ba3ec67135da1cf91ef776/tumblr_inline_nxdh4gKQBN1r87u80_540.jpg

I swear...I cannot look at Papyrus without hearing the voice that the Grumps gave him.

Seriously...watch their playthrough.  The laughs are strong with this one.
dat 8 hour day doh
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GPBBo1neb2U

Why is this teh most amazing thing I've ever heard
Waht is this
bad blitz players always miss every %%%% but lands the one on amumu

Trust me...its better to have a bad blitz player and a good adc than the other way around. Nothing more frustrating that pulling the soraka under your turret...and having her just walk away because "didnt want to miss any cs under turret" and "sorry i was watching top lane" 

"Why do i even?!" Blitzcrank 2015

i main amumu and this shit happened so many times i hook the enemy adc and the adc just walks away immediately while i got kill by the 2v1.

"i dont want to die too"-some caitlyn player
Came here for Sans

> [{quoted}](name=Ronan Samurai,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jE4uK7HZ,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-12-23T01:38:49.993+0000)
>
> Came here for Sans

Didn't we all?
Megalovania remix of Karthus' /dance sounds incoming?
Roflcopters

Hopefully you've all already listened to "Drop Pop Candy - Sans & Papyrus"
https://soundcloud.com/luxiay-kuragon/drop-pop-candy-sans-papyrus
If not here you go!

> [{quoted}](name=XBlazeIce,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jE4uK7HZ,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-12-23T17:52:07.429+0000)
>
> Hopefully you've all already listened to "Drop Pop Candy - Sans & Papyrus"
> https://soundcloud.com/luxiay-kuragon/drop-pop-candy-sans-papyrus
> If not here you go!

That was amazing! XD
won't his silence stop karthus channel?
Karthus players generally turn E on (that big circle of aoe damage) and if/when they die it's good to ult then, as the enemy team can't interrupt it
karthus w dmg would be enough to kill people if he is really fed
Hmmmmmmmmmmm
Thank you Mister Skeletal
